title: Teaching Method Practical Competency Enhancement: Object-Oriented Programming and Serious Games for Improving Computational Thinking

context.prior_knowledge: Basic comprehension of programming terminology (conditional statements, loops, etc.)
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can explain the four core concepts of object-oriented programming (encapsulation, inheritance, abstraction, polymorphism) by applying them to real-world cases
Learners can implement problem decomposition and algorithm design processes based on computational thinking through game missions
Learners demonstrate the ability to model complex problems through object interactions by achieving a game score of 80 points or higher

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
